# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Queries or modifies the value of the score counter with given identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(id: ScoreCounter.ID) -> Int64? { get set }
```

## Parameters

- **id**: The identifier of the score counter to be returned.
